biotools.summary:
The purpose of this tool is to harmonize the intensity dynamic ranges of MR T2W prostate images through a deep learning model that transforms the input image into an harmonized one closer to a curated reference set of high-quality contrast MR T2W.
prostate images.

bioschemas.name: MRI Image intensity harmonization
bioschemas.summary:
The purpose of this tool is to harmonize the intensity dynamic ranges of MR T2W prostate images through a deep learning model that transforms the input image into an harmonized one closer to a curated reference set of high-quality contrast MR T2W.
prostate images.
